Leland follows the story of Leland P. I have always loved The Muppets. Though most children's entertainment then wasn't that likable, The Muppet's was. The Muppet's were a weird mix of handmade puppets that looked like your grandparents hand stitched them, and wild humour that kids found hysterical. I first saw this mini-series as a child and though I am a child no longer, I still love it!!! Professional copies are hard to find, however, due to the subject matter. I especially value the technological aspect of the program and the horrific portrayal of Space Age propaganda and genocide.

Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: the beginning consists of an adult Miyazawa who has died and finds his past life before his death through dreams. Then in the second part, it's an overly romanticized teen version of Miyazawa based on his classic book "Ginga Tetsudo no Yoru
